comment.author: 22563422@N03
comment._content:
This is really a "Portuguese Long Distance Machine", and what a find this photo is!
This is a Breguet 16 Bn-2 that left Lisbon on 7 April 1924 to make the first Lisbon-Macau flight. "Patria", or has it has been recorded in history as "Patria I" crash landed in India. The travel was completed on a DH9 locally bought, and named "Patria II". This is the best picture of "Patria" that I am aware of! Thank you, San Diego Air and Space Museum!

comment.author: 79831906@N07
comment._content: You can see the christ cross on the upper wing and the Portuguese flag on the rudder!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
